long description: All Local & STD Calls @ 30p/Min First 60 Sec @ 2p/Sec
All Local & STD Calls @ 25p/Min First 60 Sec @ 2p/Sec

Unlimited Local Idea Mobile Calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.10/min will be applicable. -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.

Free Local/STD Calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable. -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.

Free Local/STD Calls -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, tariff @ Rs 0.10/min will be applicable. -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
